name.ja: <ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>華<rt>げ</rt></ruby><ruby>三<rt>さん</rt></ruby><ruby>界<rt>がい</rt></ruby><ruby>流<rt>る</rt></ruby><ruby>転<rt>てん</rt></ruby>

text.en: Special Summon 1 "Apodrakosis" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, but return it to the hand during the End Phase. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Apodrakosis" Continuous Spell you control or in your GY or banishment; place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Apodrakosis Eternal Recurrence of Trailokya" once per turn.
